summary: This mod adds two high elves companions to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two high elves companions to the game.

[u] [b] Background Story : [/b] [/u]

Alendil and Indoval are two cousins born and raised in the Summerset Isles, who settled in Skyrim to escape the Aldmeri Dominion empire and its radical ideology.

The purpose of the two cousins consists in limiting the expansion of the Thalmor\'s power in Skyrim.

Therefore they are going to assist anybody who\'s willing to prevent the Thalmor from achieving their objectives.

[u] [b] Locations : [/b] [/u]

Alendil can be found in the Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge. He\'s a friendly companion, wielding a sword and a shield to protect himself. He can also use his bow to kill distant enemies.

Indoval can be found in the Dead Man\'s Drink Tavern in Falkreath. He\'s more reserved than his cousin, but has strong nerves and his hand never trembles when he shoots an enemy with his bow.

[u] [b] Features : [/b] [/u]

Both followers will level up with the player. I gave them some perks which follow their class and the way they should fight. They are essential, which means they can take damage but can\'t die. You can also marry them (as requested).


Feel free to comment, to give any improvement suggestion and to report any bug.

Thank you !
author: stereonpl11
